scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && echo 'Build Complete. Checking dist:' && ls -la client/dist && mkdir -p server/public && cp -r client/dist/* server/public/ && echo 'Copied to server/public'
